channel.title: Error: /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p .*/~FikaMedHasse/blogposts/.* --follow --with-body --body-remove-csss header --body-remove-csss footer --title ~FikaMedHasse posts on ctrl-c.club https://ctrl-c.club/~FikaMedHasse/blog.html -o ./feeds/FikaMedHasse.xml

item.title: newslinkrss error: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='ctrl-c.club', port=443): Max retries e
item.description:
An error occurred when generating this feed.
